name: angular-universal-ssr
description: Angular Universal SSR with Module Federation

scripts.start: pnpm build:shell && pnpm build:client && pnpm start:shell & pnpm start:client
scripts.e2e:ci: pnpm run start & sleep 1 && wait-on tcp:4000 tcp:3000 && npx cypress run --config-file ../cypress-e2e/config/cypress.config.ts --config '{"supportFile": "../cypress-e2e/support/e2e.ts"}' --spec "./e2e/tests/runAll.cy.ts" --browser=chrome
